results.title: Closed chest and cardiac massage
results.creator_credit: Guy Fergusson and Stewart Hardy Films
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Emergency Resuscitation”.
The techniques of closed chest cardiac massage is demonstrated by instructor, and by means of animated diagrams. The need for correct technique is stressed, when the method is used, accompanied by exhaled air resuscitation in cases of cardiac arrest and respiratory failure. The hazards of careless of misdirected application are explained.

results.title: Close your eyes and hold your stomach
results.brief_description: In a survey of some of the ways Australian children are discovering their own kind of theatre, this film focuses on a touring children’s theatre company, the Pageant Theatre in Education, which tours Australian schools. School children are invited by the actors to participate in the production of each play and their responses influence the shape of the play. Children of different age groups are observed creating fantasy worlds on the one hand and recreating political and social issues on the other. Made with the assistance of the Australian Film & Television School. Narrated by Robert Bruning.

results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Basketball Skills”.
One in a series of films on basketball skills, giving instruction and demonstration of basketball techniques, including slow-motion action and training routines

results.title: Close harmony
results.brief_description: An inspiring documentation of the work of music teacher Arlene Symons in bringing together a chorus of children from the 1979-1980 class of the Friends School in Brooklyn, New York and the senior chorus from the Council Centre for Senior Citizens, Brooklyn. Three months of separate rehearsals took place, and a pen pal program set up between the two groups. A week before the concert, the groups came together.

results.title: Close encounters of the third kind [DVD]
results.creator_credit: Steven Spielberg, Michael Phillips, Julia Phillips, Victor Vasarely, EMI/Parlophone and Columbia
results.brief_description: Roy Neary (Richard Dreyfuss) witnesses the arrival of flying saucers from an alien world. Thus begins an incredible series of events, culminating in the ultimate encounter with other worldly beings as Neary is led aboard the awesome mothership. Humans and aliens have made peaceful contact. Spielberg has replaced certain scenes with previously unreleased footage and expanded the dimensions of special effects with a breathtaking new ending that takes the viewer inside the dazzling Mothership and beyond the outer reaches of the imagination. Cast also includes Teri Garr and a special appearance by Francois Truffaut as Lacombe.

results.title: Close Encounters of the Third Kind
results.brief_description: After an encounter with UFOs, a line worker feels undeniably drawn to an isolated area in the wilderness where something spectacular is about to happen.

constellations_other.name: The Kubrick connection
constellations_other.description: The visual effects for Blade Runner drew on a number of techniques from other iconic films, including two of Stanley Kubrick's masterpieces.

results.title: Close encounters of the sexual kind (Captioned)
results.brief_description: Sequel to “Contraception: ready or not” addressing myths, facts and attitudes towards sexually transmitted diseases. Designed to encourage a responsible attitude towards sex and contraception and the prevention of STD’s. The issues raised include AIDS, the need for medical check-ups, communication and condoms.

results.title: Close-up on Kuwait
results.creator_credit: Rodney Giesler, Derek Armstrong and Kuwait Oil Company Film Unit
results.brief_description: From Kuwait more oil is shipped annually than from any other oil port in the world, bringing in return a wealth of manufactured goods from other countries. A Government Development Board ensures that the country as a whole shares this new prosperity in the free State medical service, schools, and research into cultivation of desert areas.

results.title: Close-Up
results.brief_description: This fiction-documentary hybrid uses a sensational real-life event—the arrest of a young man on charges that he fraudulently impersonated the well-known filmmaker Mohsen Makhmalbaf—as the basis for a stunning, multilayered investigation into movies, identity, artistic creation, and existence, in which the real people from the case play themselves.
